1283980.name: Retro Ride
1283980.description:
A musically interwoven driving arcade game.

Features:


  • Pulsing patterns and smashing sound waves light up the sky as you cruise the highways.
  • Vibrant visuals respond to different audio frequencies and music events.
  • Crunch it to your favorite music using the YouTube playback ! Or discover new tracks by plugging into an internet radio station!
  • Beat songs to compete on leaderboards and earn credit to buy new cars.
  • Big selection of cars , from sportscars to hippie vans!

What people are saying:


"What in the Knight Rider, leg warmers, windbreakers, 80's retrowave acid trip is this?!" - Reddit user Pandarol.

"Cool game!" - Stream viewer

"I have Hallucinogen persisting perception disorder now - thanks!" - Early Access tester.


Explore a cavalcade of retro-styled visuals as you navigate the streets of Sunset City in the musical world of your choosing. Bring your own sweet collection of tunes, explore a library of curated radio stations, or pop in the original soundtrack.
1283980.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
